website_summaries.verdict: If you are out of ideas to keep your scout elf busy this season, the tools, accessories, and 60-page book of ideas in this kit will add to your family's fun.
pros: Packed with fun ideas, tools, and accessories to keep scout elves busy this holiday season
Includes candy cane hooks, cable, swing, message cards and more
cons: The suction cups that come with it aren't very secure
Have to purchase a scout elf separately, since it doesn't come with one

customer_reviews.title: Sanity in a box
customer_reviews.text: Omg! The elf adds just one more thing to our plate each season. I keep trying to think of a way to get rid of it, but until then this kit may help me keep my sanity. Cute tools, plenty of ideas and the book is written in a way that you can share it with the kids and it doesn’t spoil the surprise. It’s meant to be something the kids leave out for their elf (a box of familiar tools the elves use during their training at the North Pole). I’m not even sharing the book with the kids so he ideas in it stay a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L

customer_reviews.title: So good! elves came early this year and I love ...
customer_reviews.text: So good!elves came early this year and I love it and it is a great family tradition I would recommend getting this and the elves
customer_reviews.author: jones

customer_reviews.title: Cute ideas, but product is cheaply made -- piece broke when removed from box
customer_reviews.text: This kit does contain good ideas and tools to make your elf even better, but don't think that some effort won't be required to do those new things. I was disappointed because one of the suction cup hooks in my kit broke when I removed it from the box. Disappointing for an item that is pretty expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lynch

customer_reviews.title: MADE ME HATE MY ELF A LITTLE LESS
customer_reviews.text: This thing saved Christmas. Everyday I have to figure out what dinner to make my family, so needless to say the last thing I want is yet another thing to figure out after a long day at work... This box made it super easy. A cute little book is included. Everything was very well made! My kids were very excited to see "Snow Snow" was doing other things then sitting on the Christmas tree and getting into the candy...
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Buhr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for new ideas for our elf and thought this would really help me out. However, the different suction cups in the set wouldn't work for me. By morning my elf has always fallen from where I stuck him. Luckily my daughter hasn't seemed to notice. But with quite a few of the ideas in this book utilizing the section cups, I was disappointed with the purchase. I think you can get just as good of ideas off the internet without purchasing this book and its tools.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well-made. Not suited for all elves.
customer_reviews.text: The concept is cute, and the product well-made, although some items don't work very well unless your elf has wires inserted. Some items were used over and over again because of this Also, the climbing boots were so difficult to get on the elf I gave up. For me it's too much money to pay for what I was actually able to use.
customer_reviews.author: Android Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I'm so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I wanted to spend the money on this kit, but I'm so glad I did! Not only does it give you accessories for your elf, it also gives you ideas and shows you how to use each one. I feel like I did a good job last year and didn't need this kit, but now that I have it I have so many more options and ideas when I'm in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: You need this if you have an elf. So much more magical then anything I created without it
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver this season already. I’ve always done just fine with every day items around the house but with some distractions as of late - I haven’t been as creative... this set is so helpful!
customer_reviews.author: jjvogt

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This gave me some extra ideas for our elves to make messes around the house. Having used what was included in the box brought extra joy to my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Tikitime

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed for our elves!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used a few of the props from this so far but each time I have, my kids have gone wild when they found our elves! I haven't really used the book for ideas yet but looked through it and there are some pretty creative ones in there! Our elves arrived very early this year so as we get closer to Christmas, it will be nice to have a book with more ideas. So far, I am very happy I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Kira's MomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fun Options for Your Elf
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but so are most Elf accessories. Cute, versatile and well made. Our grandson really laughed to see his elf grapling hooking his way across the kitchen to get to the do-nuts. We did not have trouble with the boots sticking to our wall and holding over night. Probably depends on the texture of the wall. Loved the added options this afforded.
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy twist for your elf! Glad I bought.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fun to mix up the elf's activities fairly easily. We're not ones to overdo the elf's hiding spots so this provided a fun easy twist. The message block is my fav and the kids loved it!! The elf stuff is so overpriced so I'm glad to snag this as a lightning deal under $20.
customer_reviews.author: mommat81

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend, great value
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Great ideas and the book is fantastic. My daughter lit up seeing the different props everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Shey Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Mom’s Christmas Toys
customer_reviews.text: I love playing Elf on the Shelf, it’s fun to see their eyes light up when they find him. This kit is SO much fun to play with and really upped my Elf on the Shelf game! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Dismay

customer_reviews.title: This is a must at Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality and hours of play. Great for parents, also because provides many more ideas to place elf.
customer_reviews.author: Joyfullee10

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! It really helped on those nights I didnt feel like being creative. Great stuff to choose from. Fun to use. Like the grappling hook or candy cane hook. If you're on the fence I say go for it. You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Spanish Traci

customer_reviews.title: 😊
customer_reviews.text: Good concepts - it is kind of easier just to set things up on your own- I think this makes things a bit more difficult
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition for your family elf!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun ideas in this box! The zip line was a favorite as well as the suction cup boots! This is a great addition and can help inspire some cute ideas!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My mom has been collecting elves for decades and she loved this gift!

customer_reviews.title: Does not include elf; book w/cheap plastic props only
customer_reviews.text: Description was not clear that this does NOT include an elf. No way would I pay $25 for a few little plastic props and no elf. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor quality suction cups which are the key
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but suction cups I received had folds and have no suction limiting the tricks. I bought 2 different sets and both had suction cup issues. Will be calling manufacture for assistance and hope they will send replacements. Love the concept, disappointed in quality; without the suction cups working you are limited on tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Parents who don't look at Pinterest!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the most creative person, and this kit has been great! Buddy has had more fun this year than ever before! My son says that he must have went to summer camp with the other Elves and learned all of these new tricks!
customer_reviews.author: sugarcayna

customer_reviews.title: but a great idea starter for a busy parent that struggles with ...
customer_reviews.text: A tad pricey for what you get, but a great idea starter for a busy parent that struggles with Elf ideas! Happy Elfing!

customer_reviews.title: The play kit is awesome. We are having fun with our Snowflake
customer_reviews.text: The play kit is awesome. We are having fun with our Snowflake. The little one is having a GREAT time.

customer_reviews.title: Life is much easier now :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for any Mom who has finally made it to bed only to realize the elf hadnt been moved. You can do tons of different things with the tools in this pack. Its quick & easy to use. Life is much easier with this kit.

customer_reviews.text: I had a newborn just before Christmas so it helped that I didn't have to put much effort in to it for it to be super cute and fun.

customer_reviews.title: Item not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Item not as pictured. I specifically ordered this kit because it included the blue snowflake swing (blue swing). However, what I received was a different kit that did not include the swing. Pictured above is the kit you will receive should you place an order.

For both of the elves of course.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality BUT the listing makes it seem as though ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality BUT the listing makes it seem as though elves are inclued in the kit BUT THEY ARE NOT. I see that someone clarified this in the Q and A section, but this happened after my purchase. Overall, given the price I would not have made this purchase when I did because of the lack of elves- at the time of purchase the only way to tell the contents of the kit was through pictures, and the pictures showed the elves included. Hoping for a partial refund.

product_meta.title: Elf on The Shelf Scout Elves at Play Kit
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This kit includes tips, tricks and tools to inspire your scout elf! Let the Scout Elf Training Team guide your elf through the 60-page idea book and show your elf how the 15 elf-sized tools included can create over 100 magical moments!
feature_bullets: Book features more than 100 pictures to inspire scout elves

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars277 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
